Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This thing runs for 2 days on a single charge while being used for all kinds of things,  GPS, Hot spot, email phone, e-reader.Very dependable unit.

Reviews.Title: not a bad phone
Reviews.Author: mama Kenz
Reviews.Content: good phone....battery does not last as long as my razr maxx (non hd) but lasts longer than other phones still

Reviews.Title: yay phone! :)
Reviews.Author: oreosnmilk1812
Reviews.Content: everything works good enough for me :) it doesn't have any cons that I know of so far. :)! yay!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor software, but good hardware
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Quigley
Reviews.Content: I have an extremely poor impression of this phone, after owning it for over a year.It is full of applications and bloatware that are unwanted and unremovable. The bootloader is locked, so I cannot remove this software and install a custom ROM running proper Android.The audio player frequently skips and stutters (around 1 to 6 times per song).The battery life is a strong point. This phone's battery lasts an unbelievably long time, especially for a smartphone. That was the reason that I bought it and I am extremely satisfied with the battery life component.The physical design of the phone is also quite nice. I am satisfied with the metal buttons and the heavy gorilla glass of the screen.I guess this would be a good phone for someone, but I can't imagine whom. I will get a phone running vanilla Android next time. These ridiculous devices are sort of ruining the Android brand.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: TXKSSnapper
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone because I knew that the bootloader was unlockable at the time.  I didn't have a problem with the original software, but the custom roms are great.  The battery life makes this phone very worth it.
